Texts.Chs: 这本厚达4362页的大部头，完全致力于讨厌或惹恼叶族人的任何东西。它包含了一些有用的技巧，比如“在房子里撒盐”和“点燃他们的婴儿”。据称，这是由传奇的鲛人革命家(疯狂的疯子)伊卡萨· 寻千所著。
Texts.Eng: This tome is 4,362 pages, entirely devoted to annoying or pissing off anything Floran. It contains useful tips such as 'salt their houses' and 'ignite their infants'. It was allegedly penned by legendary Hylotl revolutionary (and crazed mad-man) Yikasha Hirochi.
